name: figma-synthetic-testing
description: Synthetic User Testing plugin for Figma

scripts.compile: tsc --skipLibCheck --noEmitOnError false --target ES2018 --lib ES2018,DOM --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --outDir . code.ts ui.ts claude-api.ts personas.ts report-generator.ts
scripts.compile-code: tsc --skipLibCheck --noEmitOnError false --target ES2018 --lib ES2018,DOM --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop code.ts --outDir .
scripts.compile-ui: tsc --skipLibCheck --noEmitOnError false --target ES2018 --lib ES2018,DOM --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop ui.ts --outDir .
scripts.dev: npm run compile && npm run compile -- --watch
scripts.build-ignore-errors: npm run clean && tsc --skipLibCheck --noEmitOnError false --target ES2018 --lib ES2018,DOM --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop --outDir . code.ts ui.ts claude-api.ts personas.ts report-generator.ts
scripts.verify-files: echo 'Verifying Figma plugin files...' && ls -la *.js *.html *.json && echo 'All required files present. Plugin ready for Figma import.'

author: Claude Code
